DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : SOUTH_KOREA
DOC.TEXT: Seoul to Deregulate Petroleum Prices : The country said it will phase_out the regulations and take other measures soon to lift controls over the petroleum industry . The Ministry of Trade , Industry and Energy said companies will be able to set prices as soon as the second_half of next year . The petroleum import and export business , now open only to refiners , will soon be open_to other companies , including foreign ones , the ministry said .
